Package presentation

Class BlockrPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • presentation.BlockrPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class BlockrPanel
extends java.awt.Panel
    Panel used as containter for a BlockAreaCanvas and GameWorldCanvas. This panel fills the operating system window.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
